definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: "Hancheng pepper" has become Hancheng with big business card.
sentences.chinese: “韓城花椒”已成爲韓城響噹噹的名片。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effect of pericarpium zanthoxylum oil on experimental hyperlipemia in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察花椒仁油對實驗性高脂血症小鼠的治療作用。

sentences.english: Hancheng pepper occupied the domestic market, it is also exported to Southeast Asia.
sentences.chinese: 韓城花椒佔領國內市場的同時，還出口東南亞。

sentences.english: Can be seen at the time, Chinese prickly ash as a tribute dedicated source of local officials and the court had.
sentences.chinese: 可見在當時，漢源花椒就作爲貢品獻給官府和宮廷了。

sentences.english: Interestingly, with the emperor, empress on pepper.
sentences.chinese: 有趣的是，花椒與皇帝后妃有關。

sentences.english: Great pepper oil, also known as pepper, the dry goods for the red sauce, deep flavor.
sentences.chinese: 大花椒又稱油椒，其幹品爲醬紅色，香味濃厚。

sentences.english: Can also be dried pepper seasoning directly into the soup.
sentences.chinese: 也可將乾花椒直接加入湯中調味。

sentences.english: Translated into the modern word is, pepper with anti-aging effect.
sentences.chinese: 翻譯成現代話就是，花椒具有抗衰老的作用。

sentences.english: Zanthoxylum is also widely used as traditional Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 同時花椒作爲中藥也被廣泛應用。

sentences.english: Heat up a frying pan with oil. Stir in slices of ginger, onion, garlic, star anise and peppercorns until aromatic.
sentences.chinese: 炒鍋入油燒熱，將姜蔥蒜片，八角和花椒粒入鍋爆香。

sentences.english: Pepper its spicy and aromatic flavor is based.
sentences.chinese: 花椒是以其辣味和芳香味爲主。

sentences.english: Turn off heatsprinkle with chili oil, Szechuan chili powder , to taste, half scallion.
sentences.chinese: 關掉火，灑入花椒油，花椒麪和一半的蔥花。

sentences.english: Turn off heatsprinkle with chili oil, Szechuan chili powder , to taste, half scallion.
sentences.chinese: 關掉火，灑入花椒油，花椒麪和一半的蔥花。

sentences.english: Wash mature duck and wipe dry. Stir fry Sichuan peppercorns and coarse salt in a dry wok until fragrant.
sentences.chinese: 光鴨洗淨，抹乾水份﹔花椒粒與粗鹽用白鑊粉香。

sentences.english: Conclusion Zanthoxylum oil has a therapeutic effect on hyperlipemia in mice.
sentences.chinese: 結論花椒仁油具有治療小鼠高脂血症的作用。

sentences.english: Light into the village, are visible everywhere are busy picking green pepper villagers.
sentences.chinese: 走進光明村，隨處都可見正忙着採摘青花椒的村民。

definition: same as 朝天椒[chao2 tian1 jiao1]
